title: Lab in a Loop
summary: gRED Computational Sciences with tight in silico to wet lab validation cycles, $12B commitment

content.whatItIs: Roche's gRED Computational Sciences group with 'Lab in a Loop' concept—integrating computational prediction with wet lab validation in tight cycles.
howItWorks: Prescient Design acquisition brought AI protein design capabilities
Tight integration between in silico prediction and experimental validation
content.coreInsight: The tightest possible loop between computational prediction and experimental validation creates a flywheel where each experiment improves the models that generate the next experiments.
